title: Santiago Salazar
text:
Santiago Roberto Salazar Peña (born November 2, 1975 in <a href="Lima">Lima</a>) is a <a href="Peru">Peru</a>vian retired <a href="association%20football">football</a> defender.
Club career.
He had three spells with <a href="Peruvian%20First%20Division">Peruvian First Division</a> club <a href="Sport%20Boys">Sport Boys</a>, playing as a <a href="center%20back">center back</a>.
International career.
Salazar played for the <a href="Peru%20national%20football%20team">Peru national team</a> 13 times between 1998 and 2006.
